last_episode_to_air.name: The Summer With the Goodbyes
last_episode_to_air.overview: Summer is coming to a close, and everyone has loose ends to tie up. Shannon and Milo try to get to the bottom of Todd’s jealousy, while Ilan wonders if a long-distance relationship is in the cards for him and Sophia. And as Habs leaves for his freshman year, Juliet plans a future with Tony with or without her father’s blessing.

name: Forever Summer: Hamptons
overview: Hampton locals Avery, Frankie, Habtamu, Reid, Emelye, Hunter and Juliet have their eyes set on having the best summer of their lives, but tides change when city newcomer Ilan moves out there for the summer. Will Ilan make friends, or waves while trying to fit in? Can lifelong friendships survive the rough seas ahead? Pack your sunscreen, this summer is the hottest one yet!

episodes.name: The Summer With the Cidiot
episodes.overview: Ten young Hampton locals gear up for the most exciting summer of their lives. But everything changes when a newcomer arrives from the city to shake things up and they realize that their Hamptons bubble is about to burst.

episodes.name: The Summer With Stars, Stripes, and Chicken Fights
episodes.overview: It’s Fourth of July in the Hamptons and the crew gets together at Ilan’s for a party. Drama ensues as Hunter confronts Ilan, Reid tries to clear the air with Milo, and a chicken fight reveals someone’s true colors.

episodes.name: The Summer With Two Hotties
episodes.overview: The morning after Ilan’s party brings more than just trash to clean up. Frankie tries to make things right with Reid and Milo, while Juliet and Habs use the situation to discuss their similar experiences growing up in the Hamptons. And as Ilan juggles two dates in one week, Avery works on building new friendships, and Emelye finds solace in the ones she already has.

episodes.name: The Summer With a Side of Beef
episodes.overview: Reid throws a party to try and bring people together, only to have everything fall apart. An Instagram post reveals to Emelye just how much she’s being excluded, Habs goes on a date with an old friend, and Ilan learns that sometimes honesty is the best policy.

episodes.name: The Summer With Sinking (Friend)Ships
episodes.overview: Lottie throws a boat party, and the common denominator of the summer drama becomes clear. Meanwhile, Emelye’s sister questions the validity of her life goals, and Avery tests the waters of her relationship with Frankie. A new Dockers employee joins the team, and Ilan’s mom gives him advice, but mother can’t always be right.

episodes.name: The Summer With Exes and O's
episodes.overview: Emelye plans to throw a White Party but Hunter might RSVP “no” once he finds out who’s invited. Sophia keeps Ilan in the friendzone, while someone else’s ex may cause a budding relationship to wilt. And after Reid apologizes to Avery, will it be enough to fix their fractured friendship? Or will Avery be heading back to school with one less friend than before?

episodes.name: The Summer With the Jealous Boyfriend
episodes.overview: Avery hosts a black tie event, and Lottie's boyfriend causes things to get heated. A first kiss takes Ilan’s relationship to a new level, while Juliet struggles with her family’s rejection of her boyfriend, Tony. Frankie wonders whether he’s going to be part of Avery's post-summer plans.

episodes.name: The Summer With the Goodbyes
episodes.overview: Summer is coming to a close, and everyone has loose ends to tie up. Shannon and Milo try to get to the bottom of Todd’s jealousy, while Ilan wonders if a long-distance relationship is in the cards for him and Sophia. And as Habs leaves for his freshman year, Juliet plans a future with Tony with or without her father’s blessing.
